Author: CryptoPope#3579
Content: downloaded 2.015 and 3.0 versions and 2 days to sync.  After a restart I receive the splash screen and then is states "q for shutdown 100%" and then shuts down.

Author: smk762#7640
Content:
check debug.log to see more info on reason for shut down - 
```
               Mac:  ~/Library/Application\ Support/Komodo/debug.log
               Windows: %appdata%\Komodo\debug.log
               Linux:  ~/.komodo/debug.log```

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
which wallet's versions are these? 
> 2.015 and 3.0 versions 
ocean qt ?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: if you are using the latest ocean qt, backup the wallet.dat , delete the blockchain data and resync from scratch or bootstrap

Author: barv#0867
Content: I have a question on the token module. So each 'token' is a coloured satoshi. Is the token itself again divisible in 100 million satoshis?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
> Is the token itself again divisible in 100 million satoshis?
definitely no

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
if you want to represent an external coin that is divisible to 10^8 satoshis, you can state that each on-chain token is equal to one external satoshi
this is how it is being done for the pegs module

Author: barv#0867
Content: Thx @gcharang . I guess the same goes for the token module right? So if 1 token equals 1 satoschi, the token is not divisible?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: yes, 1 smart chain token  is not divisible

Author: barv#0867
Content: Okay. Cool. It makes sense, but it was not 100% clear in the documentation

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
ok, will add more details
but there were more details and even an explanation about NFTs , wonder when that got removed ü§î

Author: barv#0867
Content: mmm. I read those somewhere today as well
